001// Generated by delombok at Fri Nov 17 08:15:03 PST 2023
002package com.fns.grivet.service;
003
004import java.util.function.Consumer;
005import org.json.JSONObject;
006import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
009import org.springframework.integration.MessageRejectedException;
010import org.springframework.integration.support.MessageBuilder;
011import org.springframework.messaging.Message;
012import org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandlingException;
013import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
014import org.springframework.util.Assert;
015import com.fns.grivet.model.Op;
016import io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry;
017
018@Service
019@Profile("pipeline")
020public class PersistenceService {
021        @SuppressWarnings("all")
022        private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(PersistenceService.class);
023        private final EntityService entityService;
024        private final MeterRegistry meterRegistry;
025
026        @Autowired
027        public PersistenceService(EntityService entityService, MeterRegistry meterRegistry) {
028                this.entityService = entityService;
029                this.meterRegistry = meterRegistry;
030        }
031
032        @Bean
033        public Consumer<Message<JSONObject>> store() {
034                return message -> {
035                        log.trace("Received message.  Headers - {}.  Payload - {}", message.getHeaders().toString(), message.getPayload().toString());
036                        Message<JSONObject> result = null;
037                        try {
038                                Assert.notNull(message.getHeaders(), "No message headers!");
039                                Assert.notNull(message.getPayload(), "Message must have non-null payload!");
040                                Op op = Op.fromValue(message.getHeaders().get("op", String.class));
041                                Assert.notNull(op, "Message header must contain an op code!");
042                                String type = null;
043                                Long oid = null;
044                                switch (op) {
045                                case CREATE: 
046                                        type = message.getHeaders().get("type", String.class);
047                                        Assert.hasText(type, "Message header must contain a type for create requests!");
048                                        entityService.create(type, message.getPayload());
049                                        meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "create", type)).increment();
050                                        log.info("Successfully created type [{}]", type);
051                                        break;
052                                case UPDATE: 
053                                        oid = message.getHeaders().get("oid", Long.class);
054                                        Assert.notNull(oid, "Message header must contain an oid for update requests!");
055                                        type = entityService.update(oid, message.getPayload());
056                                        meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "update", type)).increment();
057                                        log.info("Successfully updated type [{}]", type);
058                                        break;
059                                case DELETE: 
060                                        oid = message.getHeaders().get("oid", Long.class);
061                                        Assert.notNull(oid, "Message header must contain an oid for delete requests!");
062                                        type = entityService.delete(oid);
063                                        meterRegistry.counter(String.join("store", "delete", type)).increment();
064                                        log.info("Successfully deleted type [{}]", type);
065                                        break;
066                                default: 
067                                        throw new MessageRejectedException(message, "Bad payload! Invalid op [%s].".formatted(op.name()));
068                                }
069                        } catch (Exception e) {
070                                log.error("Problem processing message.  Headers - {}.  Payload - {}", message.getHeaders().toString(), message.getPayload().toString(), e);
071                                result = MessageBuilder.fromMessage(message).setHeader("processed", false).setHeader("exception", e.getMessage()).build();
072                                throw new MessageHandlingException(result, "Could not process message!");
073                        }
074                };
075        }
076}
